member.name: LPDDSURFACEDESC
member.summary: The DDSURFACEDESC structure contains a description of a surface to be created by the driver.

member.name: LPDDSURFACEDESC.dwSize
member.summary: Specifies the size in bytes of this DDSURFACEDESC structure. This member must be initialized before the structure is used.

summary.para: Specifies a set of flags that determine what members of the DDSURFACEDESC structure contain valid data. This member can be one or more of the following flags:

member.name: LPDDSURFACEDESC.dwHeight
member.summary: Specifies the height of surface, in pixels.

member.name: LPDDSURFACEDESC.dwWidth
member.summary: Specifies the width of the surface, in pixels.

member.name: LPDDSURFACEDESC.DUMMYUNIONNAMEN
member.summary: N/A

member.name: LPDDSURFACEDESC.DUMMYUNIONNAMEN.lPitch
member.summary: Specifies the number of bytes between the beginnings of two adjacent scan lines; that is, the number of bytes to add to the beginning address of one scan line to reach the beginning address of the next scan line below it. The driver's DdCreateSurface callback must return this value.

member.name: LPDDSURFACEDESC.DUMMYUNIONNAMEN.dwLinearSize
member.summary: Specifies the size in bytes of a formless, late-allocated, optimized surface.

member.name: LPDDSURFACEDESC.dwBackBufferCount
member.summary: Specifies the number of back buffers associated with the surface.

member.name: LPDDSURFACEDESC.DUMMYUNIONNAMEN.dwMipMapCount
member.summary: Specifies the number of mipmap levels.

member.name: LPDDSURFACEDESC.DUMMYUNIONNAMEN.dwZBufferBitDepth
member.summary: Specifies the depth of z-buffer in bits per pixel.

member.name: LPDDSURFACEDESC.DUMMYUNIONNAMEN.dwRefreshRate
member.summary: Specifies the refresh rate in hertz of the monitor (used when the display mode is described).

member.name: LPDDSURFACEDESC.dwAlphaBitDepth
member.summary: Specifies the depth of the alpha buffer in bits per pixel.

member.name: LPDDSURFACEDESC.dwReserved
member.summary: Reserved, and should be set to zero.

member.name: LPDDSURFACEDESC.lpSurface
member.summary: Specifies the address of the associated surface memory.

member.name: LPDDSURFACEDESC.ddckCKDestOverlay
member.summary: Specifies the color key for destination overlay use.

member.name: LPDDSURFACEDESC.ddckCKDestBlt
member.summary: Specifies the color key for destination blt use.

member.name: LPDDSURFACEDESC.ddckCKSrcOverlay
member.summary: Specifies the color key for source overlay use.

member.name: LPDDSURFACEDESC.ddckCKSrcBlt
member.summary: Specifies the color key for source blt use.

member.name: LPDDSURFACEDESC.ddpfPixelFormat
member.summary: Specifies a structure that describes the pixel format of the surface.

member.name: LPDDSURFACEDESC.ddsCaps
member.summary: Specifies a structure that contains the Microsoft DirectDrawMicrosoft surface capabilities.
